mapper.insert: INSERT INTO macd SELECT M.code, P.crawled_date, short_ema * (1-(2/13)) + P.price * (2/13) as short_ema, long_ema * (1-(2/27)) + P.price * (2/27) as long_ema, short_ema * (1-(2/13)) + P.price * (2/13) - long_ema * (1-(2/27)) - P.price * (2/27) as macd_value FROM price P LEFT JOIN macd M ON P.code = M.code WHERE P.crawled_date = #{priceCrawledDate} -- 株価を参照する日付 AND M.crawled_date = #{macdCrawledDate} -- MACDを参照する日付 ;
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(crawled_date) AS crawled_date FROM macd ;
